title: "Your W/R on your Main is S**t"
body:
It seems like every time I make a post voicing my opinions I just get people rushing to op.gg to see my stats. Yes... My Diana W/R is 41%, but that's because I've played 27 games with her this ssn in ranked. the sample size is too small to be claiming anything since I can bring that up to 50% in only 5 games.

Ironically the person who said that about me was unranked with a 40% Winrate and a 33% winrate on their main.  I'm not even saying im good at the game because I suck, but I don't understand people who just run to op.gg every time someone makes a post.

replies.body: TFW those trash Kangaroos spam {{champion:238}} in solo Q and ruin your W/R cuz you're from Oce
League has an Oceania server? I thought you were all busy trying not to die to spiders and kangaroos to play video ganes
I play flex with my pet spider & kangaroo.

I also hate when I'm practicing with a champ, get put against people way above my skill level because I'm playing with a friend who's better than me, and then seeing that friend tell me to never play that champ again I did so poorly.
That's because people have to see your rank to validate your opinion. Most people arent going to take a bronze 4 41% winrate diana main very seriously.
This isn't gameplay related at all tho.
If they're going to do something like that, those people should instead look at how you played those games, not how many of them you won.

Honestly what matters more is if you're climbing or not.

I'm rotting at a <45% winrate and has never demoted. Don't give up.
People will say what they will. What does it matter

The sample size might be small, but it is better than none. So far your winrate is subpar, so we can assume that it will stay that way.

Gitgud kid ;)
One trick ponies are cancer to this game's long term health
